revised_title: Society's Activities and Contributions to Science in the Royal Society of London
tldr: This issue of Notes and Records of the Royal Society of London covers the Society's activities and contributions to science during the period from 1940 to 1945. It includes information on the Anniversary Dinner, Soirees, general news, and historical matters related to past Fellows and Foreign Members. The issue also highlights various awards, bequests, and gifts received by the Society to support scientific research and publications.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
